description: Number of independent sets of nodes in graph C_4 x P_n (n>2).
comments: Number of ways zero or more black and white stones can be placed on the points of a 2 X n grid such that no white stones are adjacent to any black stones. A078057 is a related case, where the grid is 1 X n. - _Wayne VanWeerthuizen_, May 04 2004
references: C. Bautista-Ramos and C. Guillen-Galvan, Fibonacci Numbers of Generalized Zykov Sums, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 15, 2012, #12.7.8.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,1,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 7, 35]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 5*Self(n-1)+Self(n-2)-Self(n-3): n in [1..25]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 27 2012
author: Stephen G. Penrice (spenrice(AT)ets.org), Dec 19 1999
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 20 1999
